tool_description: Analyzes journal entry text to extract main topics, themes, and subject matter using natural language processing.

entry_text.description: The full text of a journal entry to analyze

max_topics.description: Maximum number of topics to extract (1-15)

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score for topic extraction (0.1-1.0)

include_emotions.description: Whether to include emotional themes in topic extraction

custom_categories.description: Custom topic categories to prioritize in extraction

error_messages: Empty entry text: Entry text cannot be empty or contain only whitespace
Text too short: Entry must be at least 20 characters long for meaningful analysis
Invalid max_topics: Must be between 1 and 15
Invalid confidence_threshold: Must be between 0.1 and 1.0
Invalid custom_categories: Each category must be 2-30 characters long
usage: Provide entry_text and optionally configure max_topics, confidence_threshold, include_emotions, and custom_categories for personalized topic extraction.

topics.description: List of extracted topics ranked by relevance

topic_scores.description: Confidence scores for each extracted topic

primary_theme.description: The most dominant theme identified in the entry

emotional_tone.description: Overall emotional tone detected (positive, negative, neutral, mixed)

analysis_summary.description: Brief summary of the topic analysis results
